sentences.sContent: Some people believe the universe was created by a big explosion.
sentences.sCn: 有些人认为宇宙是通过一次大爆炸创造出来的。

sentences.sContent: Her behaviour is creating a lot of problems.
sentences.sCn: 她的行为引起了很多问题。

sentences.sContent: The new factory is expected to create more than 400 new jobs.
sentences.sCn: 这家新工厂预计能创造400多个新的就业机会。

words.tran: 特别创造说；创造宇宙说

trans.tranCn: 创造， 创作；  产生
trans.tranOther: to make something exist that did not exist before
